footerFields.logoText: Empowering the Backbone of Our Future
footerFields.countryRelatedText: Australia's all-in-one platform for skilled trades - jobs, training, events, and career support.
footerFields.heading: Explore
footerFields.newsletterDescription: Get the latest trade job alerts, industry news, and hands-on upskilling tips — straight to your inbox.
footerFields.acknowledgementText:
Blufutur acknowledges Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander peoples
as the first people and Traditional Custodians of the land and
waterways throughout Australia. We recognise their continued
connection to culture, community and Country, and pay our respects to
Elders past and present. Learn more about our commitment

differenceWeMakeSection.differenceWeMakeDescription: The Smart Job Search Platform for Skilled Trades Professionals.

howItWorksSection.heading: How It Works
howItWorksSection.description: Streamline Your Job Search & Career Growth.

steps.stepDescription: Create a comprehensive profile that highlights your skills, experience, and achievements. Add a video introduction and showcase your projects to stand out to employers.
Our platform uses AI to connect you with the best opportunities based on your profile.
Easily apply to jobs and get hired faster with our seamless application process.
Take online courses to enhance your skillset and improve your job prospects.

createProfileSection.profileDescription: Show off your skills, connect and build your network.

faqsSection.faqSubheading: The Smart Job Search Platform for Skilled Trades Professionals.

faqQa.faqQuestions: How do I create a profile or apply for jobs?
faqQa.faqAnswers: To get started, click “Sign Up” and follow the prompts to create your job seeker profile. You’ll be asked to enter some basic information like your work experience, skills, and preferred roles. Once your profile is set up, you can apply to jobs with just a few clicks—no need to re-enter your details.
Yes, it's completely free for job seekers.

faqQa.faqQuestions: Can I upload my resume or work portfolio?
faqQa.faqAnswers: Absolutely! You can upload documents and showcase your skills.

faqQa.faqQuestions: What types of jobs are listed?
faqQa.faqAnswers: A wide range of skilled trade jobs across various industries.

faqQa.faqQuestions: How can I improve my chances of getting hired?
faqQa.faqAnswers: Keep your profile updated and apply early to new job postings.
